content: **knitted vest in drops karisma or drops daisy the piece is worked top down with european/diagonal shoulders double neck and cables sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern u-964 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes ** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 350-400-450-500-500-550 g colour 68 light sky blue or use drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 350-400-450-500-500-500 g colour 10 light blue **needles** drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 80 cm drops circular needles size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
